38888555.review:

38865215.review:
少女の指に刺さった薔薇の棘を抜くミステリアスな女性。
19世紀、イギリスの片田舎で二人のメイドが出会うこの印象的なシーンからこのゲームの制作は始まったそうです。
主人公の少女が最初に抱いたその女性への印象は「他の全てを見下したような微笑みを湛えた嫌な人」
嫌なヤツ！嫌なヤツ！嫌なヤツ！から始まるラブストーリーのなんと尊いことか！

説明にもある通りこのゲームは選択肢を持たず最初から最後まで一本のストーリーで続いていきます。
良い物語は世界中に存在し、その一つがこういう形式で届いてくれた幸運にただただ感謝します。

ストーリーは信教、人種、生まれや地位、そしてもちろん性別にかかわらず人と人が愛し合う普遍的な物語を19世紀のヴィクトリア朝というラッピングで作り上げたため、当時の情勢を完璧に再現するようなことはありません。
実際の19世紀のイギリスでは同性愛については非常に非寛容でソドミー法として知られる法律により同性愛者は極刑とされていました。（もっともこれは男性間の同性愛についての話だったそうですが…）
もちろんだからといってそれが決して悪いことではなく多くのラブストーリーと同じように彼女たちは多くの困難に襲われ、そのたびに二人で乗り越えて行く姿を見せてくれます。
シリアスになりすぎず、かと言って終始お気楽なお話というわけでもない良いバランスといえます。
一つ残念なのが主人公二人の描写を重視した短編～中編規模の作品なのでせっかくの魅力的なサイドキャラクターたちの物語が消化不良に終わってしまう所。
いつかサイドストーリーとして他のキャラクターについても語ってくれると嬉しいです。

ストーリーを彩るのは文章だけではありません。
BGMは印象的なものが多く、特に主題歌Blackberry Honeyのインスト版は楽しげな場面を盛り上げてくれました。
また、物語の重要なキーを握るバイオリンとその演奏は演出も相まって涙を誘いました。
このゲームには多くの劇作家、詩人、作曲家の名前が登場するので彼らのことを調べるのも一つの楽しみでした。
例えば屋敷のわがままな娘はサッポーという詩人の詩がお気に入りですが、この人はレスボス島出身だったそうです。
逸話を調べるとなるほどな、と思うことしきり。

ゲームを彩るoxykomaさんのグラフィックは可愛らしく肉感的です。
シリアスなシーンだけでなくコミカルなシーンにも印象的に挿入されており、欲しい場所にしっかりとイベント絵が挿入されています。
ヌード、性的表現のタグがついていますが性表現自体は基本的には心のつながりが重視されたマイルドなものになっています。

Good
ストーリー、特に印象深いThe Thornのエピソード
BGM
グラフィック

Bad
特にセーブでもたつくUI
魅力的だが若干物足りなさを感じるサイドキャラクターたちの描写

総評
ロングスカートのビクトリア朝メイドさん同士のラブストーリーが読みたければ英語を乗り越えてでもプレイする価値があります。公称10時間のプレイ時間ですが22時間かけて読み進めても全くダレず最後まで楽しむことができました。
ロリーナとタオファの未来に幸あれ！

Very well done.

38682152.review:
本作将故事背景设定在维多利亚时代的英国，贵族Lennard家的两位女仆对彼此互生情愫，之后发生了一系列需要玩家打18X补丁的纯洁爱情故事。故事整体框架并不大，虽然有时会触及一些敏感话题，比如阶级差距、种族隔阂以及性骚扰，但是一切将剧情导向黑暗的苗头都被成功扼杀在了襁褓中，最终Lorina和Taohua无惊无险地迎来了幸福GE，真是可喜可贺，可喜可贺。

故事剧情虽然缺少起伏，但我是在玩完后才意识到这一点；因为在游玩过程中，我完全被本作的写作文笔吸引住了。这是我第一次在读VN时产生“停不下来”的感觉，以及……这也是我第一次在欧美佬的游戏里见到将中国人[spoiler]虽然是中英混血[/spoiler]作为女主角的游戏。Li Taohua，虽然名字槽点满满，我觉得但凡正常点的父母都不会给孩子取这种名字；但是忽略这些小细节，Taohua的人设真是赞到极致。亚洲面孔的高冷美人，在英国上怼傲慢贵族大小姐，下压漂亮年轻女仆，“来自东方的神秘力量”就是这样充满抛瓦。

[h1]文字上的享受...这才是我读VN时所期待的[/h1]

回归正题，虽然正题也只不过是“安利这个游戏”。游戏的英语写作水平极高，对于非英语母语者来说，我认为本作阅读难度适中，既没有刻意堆砌生涩词汇刁难读者，却又使用寻常单词写出了不寻常的美感。上到浮士德下到日常花朵，各类明喻暗喻随处可见，妙笔生花不过如此。写作者把语法运用到了一个极致，既不直叙也不绕口，让意思平淡的句子也能带有一番风趣。譬如光是“Rolina不知不觉露出了笑容”这句旁白，文中就给出了起码三种的表达方式。

为了契合维多利亚风的写作风格，游戏剧本采用了不可谓不少的神话、文学和歌剧梗，因为恰好对这几个方面有兴趣，这些时不时出现的熟悉名字实在让我惊喜。粗略地回忆了一下，对白里出现过的梗包括但不限于：瓦尔基里，伊格德拉西尔，萨福，荷马史诗，赫拉克勒斯，水仙花，鲁宾逊漂流记，浮士德，瓦格纳，李斯特，帕格尼尼，狄更斯......如果你也是喜欢玩梗掉书袋的friends，本作也会带给你许多不期而遇的小惊喜。

书到用时方恨少，现在终于悔恨自己为何没学过英语文学，不然就能更有逼格地分析这部游戏的写作风格，而不是简单粗暴的两个字：“我爽到了！”

[h1]真实的维多利亚时代！大概。[/h1]

说到维多利亚时代的英国百合故事，就不得不提萨拉·沃特斯和她的《Fingersmith》，译为《荆棘之城》，又或《指匠情挑》。萨拉·沃特斯在早期作品《轻舔丝绒》（后来被改编成BBC电视剧《南茜的情史》）中，将维多利亚时代的伦敦描写成一个更为开放的城市：女性扮作男装的情况到处可见，还有女同俱乐部与各种性质的社团的聚会场景。虽然这并非真实，而是萨拉·沃特斯根据该时期男同性恋的历史资料而杜撰的想象，但也和本作两位女主角最后私奔伦敦的结局有着异曲同工之妙。

唐突介绍了这么一大段，看似意义不明，[spoiler]实则确实意义不明[/spoiler] 其实我只是想说，在游玩本作的时候，我经常性的想到《FingerSmith》这本书，而后者是英伦百合题材的最著名作品。同时许多桥段也让我回忆起前年在北影节看的蕾雅赛杜的《女仆日记》，虽然电影是一部烂片，但是本作是一部好VN。我个人不是很了解维多利亚时代的历史，但是凭本作与其他类似题材作品的融洽度，我猜，这部游戏对于维多利亚风的描写应该算是贴近现实。

[h1]“There's nothing wrong with liking pretty girls!”[/h1]

将这样一个黄金时代成功设置成游戏舞台可不容易，而更不容易的是，舞台上的主要女性角色[spoiler]女性一词应该是多余的，因为根本没有露脸的雄性生物[/spoiler]全部形象饱满且个性鲜明。而即便只是作为“填充Bly的空白”的女仆配角，也都大致有着各自的属性。其中Constance大小姐的角色形象尤其丰富，十二岁的她脾气暴躁、待人傲慢，因此被Lennard家中所有侍从一致讨厌。但除去性格恶劣的一面，她也只是个被宠坏的小孩子。儿童的天性让她想拥有更多朋友，但她的教育没能让她学会考虑别人的感受。家庭出身更是大大拉开了她与周围人的距离，在Constance态度极差地对待他人的同时，也会突然地露出伤心的表情：“在这个家里，没有任何人真正关心我，大家都希望我直接病死。”

或许正因为这是一部皆大欢喜的喜剧，Taohua和Lorina私奔后过上了富裕日子，Theodora姐妹也搬到伦敦追求新生活，结局不明的Constance就成为了我在通关后最为挂念的角色。明明只是一个十二岁的小孩子，却喜欢或者只能喜欢弹钢琴和读萨福的诗歌；对上层社会的生活兴趣不大，又不得不像笼中鸟一样度过每日。

她的性格有点让我想到奥地利皇后伊丽莎白，或者，人们更为熟悉的称呼，“茜茜公主”。生为贵族究竟是眷顾还是诅咒，这一点无人知晓；而玩完这部作品的我们也无法得知了，因为结局收尾收得实在是过于仓促，两位女主角是过上了没羞没臊的幸福生活，包括Constance在内的其他角色却交代得不清不楚。我大概用了八个小时读完这部VN，故事明明还像没讲完的样子，然而一切就这么戛然而止，实在是有点意犹未尽。

这绝对不意味着它是一个烂尾；可能正是由于这个故事过于吸引人，才会让人希望它永远不要结束。

38305499.review:
This game was so, so, so good! It's a kinetic novel, so all you have to do is read--no choices to make or anything. I set it to auto and knit while I read and it was very relaxing and enjoyable. :)

I've always been a fan of ebi-hime's work, having been introduced to her writing through some of her free VNs, so I really looked forward to this one. I couldn't get around to playing it until a few months after release but it was well worth the wait! The level of polish on this game is astounding. The writing is top notch, the UI is gorgeous, the art is consistent and beautiful, and the music is phenomenal. (After you finish the game, you can read the composer's commentary on each track  and how carefully the soundtrack was crafted for each character/scene.)

The characters were very endearing. The relationship between the two main characters builds slowly and it really gives you a chance to appreciate the nuances of their budding romance. I really loved their interactions, and I also loved their interactions with other characters. The other maids in the household were really good for instigating a little bit of extra drama. I also really liked the contrast between Lorina's friendship with Ada and her relationship with Taohua and how it helped her learn to discern her romantic feelings for Taohua. My only story complaint is it felt like the ending didn't wrap up all the loose ends; I felt like Lady Constance's plotline never really got any closure and by the end I was rooting for her slightly after she'd opened up a bit. All in all, it's very sweet, and I don't want to spoil anything by talking about it too much!

Also! There's tasteful nudity that was very much appreciated. ;) Just make sure you aren't playing in a public space for those scenes.

38047677.review:
It's really hard to find f/f romance set before the modern era that doesn't end in utter tragedy, but Blackberry Honey knocks it out of the park with its story. The romance is fluid, the drama doesn't overbear, and the side characters are genunely interesting. And the lesbians decidedly do not die AND are characters with actual personalities rather than just vehicles for girls kissing other girls.

There's an 18+ patch if you're interested, but don't feel you need it to enjoy the story. It definitely holds its own!

37969831.review:
Pros:

-Yuri maids
-Lovely music (some of the best I've ever heard in a Yuri VN)
-Unique setting
-Pretty character and BG art
-Older/younger woman relationship
-Engaging, cute (& sometimes sexy) story
-Lorina tsundere times
-Lorina tiddies

Cons:

-Lady CONstance (though I did sympathize with her... a bit)
-Taohua backstory was very interesting, but I wish it had been handled a bit differently

Recommended for basically all Yuri fans and maid fans!

36816497.review: A very cute romance story that's nice and relaxing to read. The prose and characterization are great, as always from ebi-hime. There were a few elements of the plot that I would have liked to see explored in a bit more detail, but I was still happy with the experience and satisfied with the end. I'd recommend it to anyone who likes lesbian romance and Victorian settings.

36626495.review:
I purchased this completely on a whim not knowing what to expect and because the art style caught my eye. I ended up getting emotionally invested in the two main characters and honestly it's probably one of the more well written VNs I've read. It's interesting and smart without dragging on and being boring. The art is beautiful and the closest thing I can compare it to would be Steins;Gate except more polished and high res. The music is really well done but I found a few of the tracks a bit overused in too many areas, but there are worse problems to have. 

All in all, a really incredible VN and an example of tasteful yuri done right. Well worth the price.

*EDIT* I enjoyed the VN so much, I've nominated it for a 2017 Steam Award.

36587549.review:
A fine yuri visual novel with a great premise and a very interesting and unique setting, it's easy to see that it was very well researched.

I recommend this game to any fans of the genre, and I also think this story can stand strong enough by its other merits outside of the romantic plot.

36217794.review:
немного даже жаль, что блекберри хоней кинетическая новелла. яб не отказалась от роута с Констанс, она очень даже няша, пусть и слишком цун-цун
в самой новелле за счет хотя бы антуража 19 века довольно-таки литературный английский, как например во флаверсах. так что читать с моим таким се лвлом английского было трудновато. это уже не нептуния с ее простыми диалогами, хех
сама стори хороша. тут нет таких прям плот твистов, это просто милая юрийная история про мейд. но в целом впечатление как будто читаешь какой-нибудь качественный роман в сопровождении приятной музыки и красивых артов с бэкграундами, гспди, задники просто замечательные. еще тут очень милый юмор и забавные ситуации (чего только стоит каждое появление Эффи и перепалки между гувернантками и Констанс)
олсо, о CG. они годные, но у художника какиет постоянные траблы с длиной рук (и оппай Лорины, они слишком большие на мой взгляд, ими можно убивать). еще я видела изначальный чардиз в твиттере ebi-hime и в общем-то хорошо, что персонажи сейчас такие, какие они есть. таки изначально у них были прям сумасшедшие глаза, словно там пробежал художник какегуруя. хотя что-то такое в их взгляде так и осталось, хехе~

однозначно рекомендую всем юрийщикам. и не юрийщикам тоже, надо же приобщаться к прекрасному[spoiler]:3[/spoiler]

36126835.review: Well beyond what I expected. After a week of pondering "what could it be like" after hearing so many people commenting in other forums about it, I broke down and bought Blackberry Honey. After watching the video for it I half imagined it was going to be a poorly written "Engrish, Japanimation Smut Book". I couldn't have been more wrong. Actually, whoever wrote the book is a very articulate, well-educated native English speaker. I am about half way throgh the book now and I had to stop to come write this review. The characters are well defined, the settings for each scene are done both in description and visually so it takes a lot of the description necessary in traditional novels out in lieu of literal imagery. Think of this as a good novel that uses visual placeholders to show you what room you're in, who is present and what their condition is. If they are standing one arm across then that is the "maid's attention posture", if they are standing arms out "they are working", if they have their finger on their face "they are pensive or curious". Etc. Overall, if you're looking for a good novel that is completely devioid of "he said, she said", this will be a good read for you. Enjoy the music and the general ambiance, sit back and just watch it slowly come together.

36123407.review: If it isn't against you to read a historical, dramatic but not tragic, fictional, nice lesbian romance story, comparable in length to a book, with manga/anime style illustrations including some nudity, music, sound effects, without voice acting, then this well-written kinetic novel is a very good choice in my opinion.

36090101.review:

36072857.review:
I went into this kinetic visual novel knowing ebi-hime made it, so I knew I would like it. I just didn't know that I would like it [b]this much[/b]. 
I saw that it had some fanservice artwork in it, so I was a bit worried that it would be more lighthearted and just an excuse for yuri ecchi, but the story turned out to be much more than that. In fact, it might even be one of my favorite ebi-hime stories thus far. While there is some fanservice art, the story is not diminished in any way. The protagonist Lorine does have rather large breasts, but there's kind of a reason for it related to sexual harassment/assault; although, I feel the need to point out that a woman doesn't need anything in particular to experience such a thing. 
The story touches on heavy topics in the usual older England setting that many ebi-hime stories take place in. The characters are really well-developed and written in a way that allows the reader to either sympathize or empathize with them, even if they're villains. 
The romance aspect of this yuri VN is written extremely well. Brava, indeed. There were many times I felt not only romantic feelings in reaction to the material, but I was often overwhelmed with suspense. Each scene between Lorine and Taohua would leave me wanting to know what was to happen next. It left me addicted to the material, wanting to keep reading until I saw how everything played out. 
Another thing I can commend the story for is addressing the societal problem of sexualizing and fetishizing Asian women. Taohua is a half-Chinese, half-English character who constantly faces racism from rich, white people who look at her as though she's a museum exhibit. Her employer treats her like an object to be put on display for her rich, white guests. The story rightfully critiques this behavior and justifies Taohua's feelings of disdain for others. 

I highly recommend this lovely yuri story from ebi-hime. It's an excellent gem of a VN that shouldn't be overlooked.

36034033.review:
Victorian England. Snarky English women (and girls). Romance between two maids. 

Where do I even begin. First of all, the writing. Ebi-hime knows what they're doing. 
I took my time reading this VN because the writing was just so charming. Constance ended up being one of my favorite characters despite being a rotten spoilt little girl. The way she insults someone is so digustingly well fleshed out and above all, amusing. Never a dull moment with Lady Constance. Not to be outdone by Taohua's spellbinding allure.
More than that, you can tell ebi-hime did their research, homework, god's work etc. to make sure they were portraying and creating a perfect ambience for a Victorian England setting. As someone who aspires to be a writer, consider me a fan of yours now. 

Moving forward, the music was just as delightful. I absolutely love Taohua's theme. Fits her perfectly and I would perk up every time she came in with her fanfare. If you look in the Extras, the artist even goes into detail how they went by the process of creating the music, you know, behind the scenes stuff. 

Finally, but not definitely the least, is the artwork. Absolutely gorgeous, to sum it up. I read through the Notes and saw that ebi-hime put it upon themselves to go out and take actual photos of old English homes to send to their background artist. I was quite excited to see the actual photos of the well drawn backgrounds, in fact, I was quite delighted. And lastly, not that I have any qualms with it, but someone else already did mention it. The bosoms of some our well-endowed heroines are a little.. disproportionate. But they weren't in most other scenes, so I didn't really mind it. 

Overall, the story is light hearted and has you wanting more of the two protagonists interacting with each other; since, they are made so perfectly for one another. The story doesn't have any dark twists, but there are some rather sad and touching moments. And yes, the H-Scenes are great, and even better, the patch is free. 

I can tell just how much care and work went into this VN. So kudos to you guys.

tl;dr: dude, there's cute lesbians, hot and steamy times and a little English girl that wants you to die in a fire but not really but yeah really.

36028849.review:
Blackberry Honey is an excellent, romantic story about 2 Victorian maids. It is a kinetic visual novel about the daily life of the main character, Lorina, and how she falls in love with a fellow maid. 

It focuses on the development of their relationship, but also has a host of side characters that do have depth to them. There is a not insignificant amount of drama, mainly stemming from the actions of two particularly nasty characters, but for the most part that doesn't take away from the cute romance that is the core of this game. 

There are 5 lewd scenes, 4 of which are sex scenes. Because of this I recommend you  [b] download the H patch [/b] from [url=ebihime.itch.io/blackberry-honey] here [/url].

[b] Positives: [/b]
-Cute romance.
-Realistic characters with real depth to them. The focus is on the main 2 but a decent amount of the other characters do get some development. 
-Well written plot - the writing is engaging with being pretentious or overly simplified, and the story is interesting without being overly dramatised.
-Good sex scenes - doesn't leave too much to the imagination. 1 or 2 CGs per scene with detailed description. There is a fairly light sub/dom theme to these.
-Nice art style that is fairly unique. The characters are well drawn with numerous expressions and the backgrounds are also impressive.
-Surprisingly funny. On numerous occasions I found myself chuckling at some entertaining character interaction, often involving Effie, who is one of my favourite characters from any game I've played.
-Largely realistic - no inexplicable twists like in some other VNs. *Cough* Nurse Love Addiction *Cough*.
-On occasion, a touching story - enough to bring me to tears.
-A nice soundtrack. The music fits the scenes well.
-Decently detailed - took me around 8 or 9 hours to finish with little in it that I would say is filler.
-The extras section on the menu is very useful. It has scene select, you can view the CGs, listen to the specific songs in the soundtrack and even read notes by the author about the process of creating the game.
-It's nice that when you scroll up to go back it doesn't just bring up a text log but actually goes back.

The [b] negatives [/b] for this game are few and largely insignificant but here they are:
-I would have preferred less drama, but I can understand why it's there.
-There are two main antagonists, both of whom dislike the main character and are quite cruel to her. Only one is ever shown to have a reason for this. I would have liked to better understand the other one, although I guess it's not entirely necessary.
-On one occasion, an antagonist - Constance - does something seemingly significant ([spoiler] kisses the main character [/spoiler]) but nothing comes of it. I didn't see the point of this happening.

In conclusion, this game is great. 9/10 I strongly recommend, particularly to anyone who is a fan of yuri romance, but I think it could be enjoyed by anyone who likes romance in general.

36014977.review:
在我沉迷学习不能自拔时来一碗百合简直是心灵绿洲啊，感觉生活又有动力了

只能说不愧是ebi hime旗下的游戏，生词很多，句子不时写得很晦涩，可怜我小小的脑容量要反复翻看才get到点。啃了六小时才3个成就，慢得有点过分啊。

不过若是认真看下去还是会觉得故事很有意思，很值得一看。主人公Lorina是新上任的女仆，熊孩子主人总是使唤Lorina做些难堪的工作，工作的同事因为Lorina的一些不好的流言对她恶言相向。在Lorina总是遭遇些烦心事时，女仆长Taohua则屡屡向Lorina伸出援手，一点点地让Lorin卸下心防，最终连哄带骗将Lorina引入虎穴然后吃干抹净，真是喜闻乐见的展开。欸Lorina你怎么主动亲上去了，这跟说好的不一样啊，你丫不是虔诚的基督徒吗怎么这么不矜持。

我很喜欢的一点是主角二人的人设很带感，嗯，不包括那两团脂肪。任劳任怨，但又带有一点小脾气，自尊心很高，但又因为笨手笨脚而经常害羞的my little Lori，真是一块适合调戏的好材料——by 神秘而邪魅的东方人Taohua。看着Taohua捉弄Lorina，还不时撩一下，真是让人忍俊不禁。像这样甜蜜蜜的轻松日常（对Lorina来说并不轻松），不来一碗吗?

翻了翻讨论区里的bug反馈贴，原来解锁成就有bug，需要删除两个文件才能解锁成就。一个是C:\用户\用户名\AppData\Roaming\RenPy\Eromeidos-1467738994里的persistent。另一个是游戏安装目录\game\saves里的persistent。两个都删了就能解锁成就了

唯一的雷点是……主角胸前夸张到不正常的脂肪团。腰上不长肉是不可能胸口有这么多脂肪的！这不科学！

35999193.review:
The writing, music, art, and pretty much everything of this novel is excellent. While there were one or two errors, they were barely noticeable and did nothing to mask the evocative and moving writing of ebi-hime. The soundtrack by yuzuki was fitting with a lovely motif throughout, and there was enough variance in songs that I never got bored of any of them. The romance between the characters developed in a very non-cliche and believable way. 

All in all, this is a great visual novel, even without any choices to make. I recommend this to anyone who likes to read, likes romance, or likes cute and sexy maids.

God, they're incredibly cute and sexy maids. 10/10 would moe again. ♥

35982534.review:
[b] 提示：按鼠标中键隐藏对话框！[/b]

[h1] Blackberry Honey -- 古典欧风百合VN[/h1]
继Love Ribbon后的一个让我狂等的VN，和Love Ribbon一样，打了个开头来写个测评先。
这种VN中文基本没戏的，学好英语一劳永逸。对比一下我觉得Blackberry Honey的文本阅读难度比Love Ribbon要大上不少，就单单开头女主Lorina月下的自白那段就已经相当的文艺，拉上来第一句景色描写就是一个明喻加一个暗喻，而且生僻词汇运用的很多，词汇量不够充实的话阅读起来会很难受。但如果英语阅读能力比较强的话，文本读起来还是相当的有美感。

[h1] 给诸位敲碗等百合的讲一下大致的内容：[/h1]

两位女主缘起利物浦，同为Lennard家大宅的女仆，两人的待遇却一个天上一个地下。粉毛女主Lorina天天受自己的同事们欺负，上司也非常严厉，小主人Constance大小姐还对自己百般为难，每天的生活难熬至极。而另一位黑发女主是宅子里地位最高的女仆，为人清高，被主人信赖，绝对帅气潇洒，[strike] 名字叫咲夜	[/strike]，其实叫桃花。两位女主明明地位悬殊，却因一次巧合而结缘。这天Lorina因为小主人的刁难被花园里的玫瑰伤到了手，血流不止，却巧遇桃花。平日潇洒高冷的门厅女仆却一反常态，宁可耽搁给主人泡红茶的任务也要为Lorina包扎，期间还言语调戏Lorina，甚至给她起了“Lori”这个爱称，而Lorina毫无办法。这天夜里，Lori回想起白日桃花对自己的行为，又羞又气，久久不能忘怀。也不知道这究竟是气恼还是某些情感上的在意。

[b] 以上内容基本都是我编的。[/b]

这部VN有10w字的巨量文本（没有分支选项的），想必发展也会比较慢热，可能适合慢慢地去阅读，而且之后的展开可能会带进新的cp之类的吧，我也不知道，在游戏简介里提到后来Lori中了一个老女士的法术，所以可能还会有些奇幻元素？也有可能这spell是个比喻啥的，但这也说明了小说后期肯定会有阴谋之类的，故事也会比Love Ribbon的校园风更加开阔。
美术风格上的话就见仁见智了，我个人还蛮喜欢这种画风的，看到目前来说好像没有什么崩图，主要角色对话时用立绘，一些配角也都有小头像在对话框左边，相当的细腻。

（我不知道为什么最近这些欧美佬做的优秀百合VN都喜欢用粉黑？？而且主角都是粉毛？？）
[strike] 和Iris不一样，这次粉毛女主是个大奶怪[/strike]

[h1] 再说一下 音乐：[/h1]
游戏作者在游戏简介里提到游戏的关键词是“女仆”，“音乐”，“[strike]We found love in a hopeless place[/strike]”，“在最不可能的地方找到真爱”。既然敢把音乐拿出来当做关键词就能看出作者对配乐演出是非常自信的。
不得不说，这部作品的音乐风格非常的多变，最开始起床看着众女仆聊天时的音乐是古典钢琴和八音盒风格，在进入工作之后就转换成了巴洛克风格（大概吧）。而且编曲也都相当的不错，是那种听上一段时间也不会厌烦的类型。其实我在刚读完开头之后就猜到这款游戏肯定会卖OST，毕竟这种程度的音乐演出做个OST卖一卖确实不过分。偏古典的配乐搭配上文学风的台本，读起来完全不会烦躁，很有情景代入感。

还有就是这个VN的UI做的真的很好看！

别的也没什么好说的了，毕竟也还没玩多少，先发个测评，望抛砖引玉。

[spoiler]问一下R18补丁该解压到哪个目录下啊？？	[/spoiler]

35977775.review:
It's pretty alright. Would recommend to yuri-obsessed losers like me with a few caveats:

TAOHUA NEVER GETS HER PIBBY-WIBBY FINGERED,
the art is kinda awkward in terms of Tiddy and composition (they look at the camera a lot) and was honestly a strange choice for a yuri game,
and, the church segments felt pretty pointless for the most part. They seem(ed) to be leading up to something thematically but nothing was done.
It was a bit anticlimactic. 

It's pretty HNGH besides. Look okay Taohua is totally my type okay???? Do n't jud g e
Disclaimer: I am not into BDSM and have no right to comment on the pet play(?) therein. I have no idea whether or not it is represented fairly and accurately.


Edit: It totaled around three hours. I mean, I DID skim the sex scenes and skip most transitions, but just be aware that the price tag is a slight bit heftier than what most people are used to for a VN of this length.
Production quality is good, though! OP with vocals yasss

I'd recommend A Little Lily Princess for reading other Victorian-ass gay VNs, though that's a lot less, uh, scandalous than this one.
